__e: Why can't we ever throw a party or have a wedding, or just live our lives without evil screwing it up?
I think you should go to your room and stay there till the party's over, before you spoil everything.
So either let these terms stand, or do what you always do and screw everything up.
Now, I'd say you've got one last shot here, and I don't want you to blow it. Okay?
I hope he doesn't blow it 'cause I haven't had a dad in a long time and I know he'd be perfect.
I like you a lot, and I like being around you. And I don't want to do anything to screw that up.
I don't want you messing things up around here for any of us, so...
Now do us all a favor and don't mess things up with her again.
And I didn't want you screwing things up for me. (clicking TONGUE)
And I won't let anybody mock my work.
I wouldn't want you to ruin my experience of your home.
Okay, fine, so you don't like me being here, fine... but don't blow my cover.
We've got to get that letter back before it ruins the New Year for the both of us.
I know I'm not exactly a welcome houseguest these days, but we shouldn't let our recent history overshadow our past.
She is having a great time,so please don't ruin her weekend trying to prove to yourself that you are a good father.
If it's her fault, then why are you letting it ruin your life?
You said, "Don't screw up the best thing in your life... just because you're a little unsure about who you are."
I don't want to ruin his life just bause I did something I shouldn't have.
No, I think I'll just swim back and avoid someone seeing us together and ruining my entire summer.
"Take my daughter... come up to my country house and ruin my weekend with Rachel."
Tell me who you are, and what you want with my son-- before you make me go ruin my wallpaper.
